abstract: Symantec, the computer security company, suggests that a group it calls Morpho is after intellectual property, possibly to sell it to competitors or nation states.

headline.main: Symantec Report Suggests Hackers’ Motives Are Blurring
headline.print_headline: Intellectual Property the Target of Hacking Group, Report Says

snippet: Symantec, the computer security company, suggests that a group it calls Morpho is after intellectual property, possibly to sell it to competitors or nation states.
